price: 假若没有从安拉发出的以往的判决，那么，你们必为收纳赎金而遭受重大的刑罚。
arabic: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
